com.datumbox.framework.statistics.sampling

Class SRS

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datumbox.framework.statistics.sampling.SRS

  • public class SRS
extends Object
    This class provides methods which can be used for performing Simple Random Sampling.
    Author:
    Vasilis Vryniotis
